Attribute.name: custEventStatusDetail
Attribute.HelpText: This attribute conveys event status detail info, e.g. error code and other details in case of failure of the associated LDAP operation.

Attribute.name: custEventOp
Attribute.HelpText: This attribute specifies the LDAP operation name associated with this event, e.g. ldapbind, ldapadd, ldapsearch etc.

Event.name: UserLogin
Event.unusedAttributes: HostingClientId ModuleId UpstreamComponentId DownstreamComponentId SecondarySessionId ApplicationName Target Resource
Event.HelpText: User login (LDAP bind) to OID server. This event is generated by ldapbind operation. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user logged in to OID.

Event.name: UserLogout
Event.unusedAttributes: HostingClientId ModuleId UpstreamComponentId DownstreamComponentId SecondarySessionId ApplicationName Target Resource AuthenticationMethod
Event.HelpText: User logout (LDAP unbind) from OID server. This event is generated by unbind operation. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user logged out of OID.

Event.name: CheckAuthorization
Event.unusedAttributes: HostingClientId ModuleId UpstreamComponentId DownstreamComponentId SecondarySessionId ApplicationName Roles
Event.HelpText: Permissions granted/denied to user for performing an LDAP operation. This event is generated by ldapadd, ldapdelete, ldapcompare, ldapmodify operations. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user performing the LDAP operation. Target attribute of this event is the DN of the user to whom authorization is granted/denied and resource attribute is the entry DN or the attribute on which operation authorization is granted/denied.

Event.HelpText: Create a user or group. This event is generated by ldapadd operation. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user performing the LDAP operation. Target attribute of this event is the DN of the user or group that is created.

Event.HelpText: Delete a user or group. This event is generated by ldapdelete operation. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user performing the LDAP operation. Target attribute of this event is the DN of the user or group that is terminated.

Event.name: DisableAccount
Event.unusedAttributes: HostingClientId ModuleId UpstreamComponentId DownstreamComponentId SecondarySessionId ApplicationName Roles
Event.HelpText: Disable a user or group. This event is generated as a result of ldapbind or ldapcompare (e.g. through SSO) operation. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user performing the LDAP operation. Target attribute of this event is the DN of the user or group that is disabled.

Event.name: EnableAccount

Event.HelpText: Enable a user or group. This event is generated as a result of ldapbind or ldapcompare (e.g. through SSO) operation. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user performing the LDAP operation. Target attribute of this event is the DN of the user or group that is enabled.

Event.name: custInternalOperation
Event.HelpText: Internal LDAP operation. This event is generated by LDAP operation such as ldapadd, ldapdelete, ldapcompare, ldapmodify, ldapsearch. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user performing the LDAP operation. Target attribute of this event is the DN of the user whose attribute is added/deleted/modified/searched and resource attribute is the user's attribute on which the operation is performed.
